contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=February 2013}} {{Infobox Airline |airline = Quadro-Aero |logo = |logo_size = |fleet_size = 1 |destinations = |IATA = - |ICAO = QVR |callsign = - |parent = |company_slogan = |founded = 2000 |ceased = 2004 |headquarters = [[Image:Flag of Kyrgyzstan.svg|20px]] [[Bishkek]], [[Kyrgyzstan]] |key_people = |hubs = [[Manas International Airport]] |secondary_hubs = |focus_cities = |frequent_flyer = |lounge = |alliance = |website = }} '''Quadrotour-Aero''' was a [[Kyrgyzstan]] based airline operating a fleet of single [[Ilyushin IL-62]], registration EX-62100. This particular aircraft was an original IL-62 series model, not the upgraded IL-62M or IL-62MK like the most, and at the time of airline operations one of only a handful of those still operational.<ref>[http://aerotransport.org/php/go.php?query=operator&qstring=Quadrotour-Aero&where=107227&luck= Quadrotour-Aero (ATDB)]</ref> ==External links== {{Portal|Aviation}} ==References== {{reflist|2}} {{Airlines of Kyrgyzstan}} {{Aviation lists}} [[Category:Defunct airlines of Kyrgyzstan]] [[Category:Airlines established in 2000]] [[Category:Airlines disestablished in 2004]] {{Kyrgyzstan-transport-stub}} {{Asia-airline-stub}}
